name: Organical
description:
A 4-part text narrative I made for a class. An interactive fiction that goes at your own pace, where you can explore & discover the post-apocalyptic world.

   The story revolves around you - the main character - needing to travel across an unfamiliar & strange world in order to get a cure for your terminally-ill Guardian, or loved one.

   The story is divided into four chapters, or sections (Prologue, Act I, Act 2, Act 3). The goal of each section is to progress to the next "district". The player will have to interact with in-world elements to solve puzzles and collect important objects.

   Certain choices you make can and will be reflected on later in the story, for better or worse.

   This game is virtually complete, but please leave some feedback if you run into any problems or errors during your playthrough. There are a total of 192 passages (impossible to view all passages in one single playthrough).

   Thank you for playing!
